titleStmt.title: SII 8.52: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 52. (A.R. No. 464 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravatti kaḷ Avaṉiāḷappiṟantārāṉa śrīkopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 5vatu nāḷ 3 100 10 4- ṉāl coḻako ṉolai . teṉṉavaṉ brahmamārāyarum jayatuṅkappallavaraiyarum tillaiyampalappallavaraiyarum Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvara kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum sāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilṉāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇ(ṭ)ṭu viṭutantatāvatu .
koyilukkum tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya periyanācciyārkkum cāttiaruḷa tirucceṅkaḻunirt tirupaḷḷittāmamākka perumāḷ tiruvoṭai Eṉṉum perāl ceykiṟa tiruvoṭaikku perumpaṟṟappuliyūrt teṉpiṭākai puvalokamāṇikkavaḷanāṭṭu koppāṭiyāṉa kaṇapatinallūrppāl coḻamātevivatikku meṟkum śrīdevivāykkālukkut teṟkum Aiñcāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu ṉālāñ catirattu teṉkiḻ kaṇṭattu vācciyaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ comaṉpakkal vācciyaṉ Etirilāpperumāḷ tiruvalañcuḻiyuṭaiyāṉperil kācu Āyirat
taiññūṟṟukku vilaikoṇṭa kuḻi Aiññūṟ ṟorupattiraṇṭum Ivvūril Ikkaṇṇāṟṟu Iccatirattu Uḻaiccāṇaṉ koṟṟaṉ kovaṉpakkal meṟpaṭiyāṉperilk kācu Āyirat taiññūṟṟukku vilaikoṇṭa kuḻi Aiññūṟ ṟorupattiraṇṭum Ākak kācu muvāyirattukku vilaikoṇṭa kuḻi Āyirat tirupattunāliṉāl Ūrppaṭi nilam Eṭṭumā Innilam Eṭṭumāviṉāl virivunilam Araiye kāṇi Iṉnilam Araiye kāṇiyum Aiñcāvatu mutal tirucceṅkaḻunī riṭṭut tiruppūmaṇṭapattu mutalāka Eṇṇavum Iṉṉilam vilai
koṇṭa sādhanaṅkaḷum Innilattukku maṭaṅku kaḻitta Ūravar Eḻutiṉa niyogaṅkaḷum tirukkaiy Oṭṭip paṇṭārattup pukaviṭṭu Etiriṭai Iṭṭu Ippaṭikkut tirumāḷikaiyile kal veṭṭappaṇṇuvate . Ivai coḻako ṉeḻuttu Eṉṟum pukunta Ēvalttiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.52 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
